attributes.additional_details: Residents and or visitors have no where to park.
attributes.background: Building more residential properties and getting rid of any on road parking is criminal

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.  

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do - we're not sure if you'd like this to apply to all existing double yellow lines or only new ones.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
